status.fileTooLarge: The file is over the limit of 10 MiB ({size})

apiErrors.generic: An error occurred on the server side. Please try again, and if the issue persists, contact us.
apiErrors.rate_exceeded: The client has been rate-limited, please try again in a few seconds.
apiErrors.capacity: The server is experiencing high load, please try again in a few seconds.
apiErrors.service_unsupported: This server does not support the service you are trying to use.
apiErrors.service_disabled: The service you are trying to access has been disabled by the server.
apiErrors.link_invalid: The link you provided is invalid. Please verify the link.
apiErrors.link_unsupported: The link you provided is not recognized. Please check the link and try again.
apiErrors.fetch_fail: An unknown error occurred while fetching the media. Please ensure the link is correct.
apiErrors.fetch_critical: The service you are trying to access is returning unexpected data. Please try again later.
apiErrors.fetch_empty: The service returned an empty response. Please try again later.
apiErrors.fetch_rate: The server has been rate-limited by the service you're trying to access. Please try again later.
apiErrors.content_too_long: The media you are trying to download is too long. Please try a shorter video.
apiErrors.content_video_unavailable: The video you're trying to download is either region-locked or blocked by the service_
apiErrors.content_video_live: The video you're trying to download is live, and live videos cannot be downloaded.
apiErrors.content_video_age: The video you're trying to download is age-restricted and cannot be accessed.
apiErrors.content_video_private: The video you're trying to download is private. Please ensure it is public or unlisted.
apiErrors.content_video_region: The video you're trying to download is region-restricted.
apiErrors.youtube_decipher: Cobalt couldn't decipher the video. Please try again later.
apiErrors.youtube_login: YouTube has marked the server as a bot. Please try again later and if the issue persists, contact us.
apiErrors.youtube_token_expired: The YouTube token has expired. Try again in a few seconds, and if the issue persists, contact us.
apiErrors.youtube_no_hls_streams: The video you are trying to download does not have any HLS streams available.
